game.name: The Last Manifest
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, LAN PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Explore a ghostly spaceship in this cooperative sci-fi horror! Repair the ship, collect vital components, and avoid lurking creatures. Uncover the mystery of your mission before the ship consumes you entirely.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Explore a ghostly spaceship in this cooperative sci-fi horror! Repair the ship, collect vital components, and avoid lurking creatures. Uncover the mystery of your mission before the ship consumes you entirely.
